alert.note: Alert for Claiborne; Copiah; Warren (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 30 at 5:48AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Tensas Parish, southwestern Warren, Claiborne, Jefferson and western Copiah Counties through 630 AM CST... At 548 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Helena to near Stampley. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Fayette and Mcnair around 555 AM CST. Newellton and Lorman around 600 AM CST. Red Lick around 605 AM CST. Port Gibson, Blue Hill and Pattison around 615 AM CST. Peyton, Mcbride and Pleasant Hill around 620 AM CST. Allen and Yokena around 625 AM CST. Rocky Springs, Barlow and Reganton around 630 AM CST. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
